content: Insurance Asked by AnonymousAsked on 25 Feb 2019What better ways to pay for yearly Insurance Premiums?Hi, just wondering what are the better options to fully benefit from these yearly payments?3 answersAnswerBump0

Lam Ka YingLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 22 Aug 2019HSBC Advance credit card and a few others do not exclude insurance from cashback!0 comments1

Loh Tat Tian, 2nd Hand Insurance Broker / EX-FA at Singapore Insurance Value FindingLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 22 Aug 2019Current hack you can use is to top up to grabpay using UOB One Card, and then use AXS to pay off your premiums.However, most cards do not have much benefit in paying insurance premiums.0 comments1

Guo Hao Teo, Self-Taught Enthusiast at Personal FinanceLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 25 Aug 2019Heard about Cardup as a service which you can use to pay your insurance premiums and get points for it.You can definitely check it out to find out more.0 comments0
